profile: Our service includes a full deep clean of all the inner components (cooking grates, heat plates, etc.), interior surfaces, and the entire exterior. We also replace the grease tray and ensure that there is no harmful rusting anywhere on the grill. The exterior is cleaned and polished for a shiny new look.
